5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: On this episode, Cameron once again hooks up with Neil Ormond of NAO Design, where Neil shows off his prize urban assault creation, the JL421 Badonkadonk Tank. After terrorizing the neighborhood, Cameron then gets his hands on a new brand new foosball table from Billiards and Barstools. He reviews some more products from The Sharper Image in his home. Cameron decides to pull the trigger on his very own Power Harness Hang Glider, so he travels to Seattle to learn about the prototype X1 Glider by inventor Ken Osage.

imdb.plot outline: Gear looks at the coolest boy toys on the planet. Each episode finds host, Cameron Smith, traveling the country to play with toys that both the indoor technophile and the outdoors adventurer craves. Gear is the definitive destination for the man who literally wants to play all day.
